Text:
A nice episode but I can't believe they didn't re-edit the show to mention the passing of T-Bone at the end of it...even a fade out of "T-Bone 1951-2010" would have been respectful at the least.

I first saw T-Bone at the Spectrum in Philly in 1982 during the H2O tour and in almost every H&O concert since. He was and always will be part of H&O's legacy. I hope he gets the respect he deserves.
